mapper.select: SELECT m.Mem_No as memNo, m.ID as id, m.Name as name, m.Addr1 as addr1, m.Addr2 as addr2, m.Zipcode as zipCode, m.Pho_No as phoNo, m.Email as email, m.Point as point, m.Photo_Url as photoUrl, l.Apply_Date as applyDate, l.Apply_No as applyNo FROM MEMBER m, LEND l WHERE l.Mem_No=m.Mem_No AND l.Apply_No=#{applyNo}
mapper.update: update LEND set Assign_Date=now(), Apply_Status_Code='2' where Apply_No=#{applyNo}
update LEND set Reject_Date=now(), Apply_Status_Code='3' where Apply_No=#{applyNo}
